name: Adficio
description:
Adficio for the Dungeon Crawler Game Jam 2023 with the Theme "Duality". The duality has been interpreted as Urban vs Nature.

You'll be playing a native elf who defends their territory against a guild of mining which is cutting down the forest for the interest of the nearby town. Go to the complex, find their boss and kill him to win.

It's a downloadable game for windows only (didn't had the time for the rest).

Controls are simple :

moving : WASD (adapt to you keyboard)

moving + shift : Strafing

F : interactions

R : use item

Q & E : Previous and Next items

C : waiting

-------------

Known bug :

- the game HATES alt+tab so avoid those if possible

- the help by clicking the question marks may tell no truth about what the game has to offer due to time limit - tho most of the mechanics are still in and do work

- for any other problem, please tell me about it!

Note that you can edit your controls in options.

All resources (except the fonts) are made by me. Graphics were also generated by an AI I do have on my machine to assist me (tho I had to do the edits myself).

The work already there before the game jam were just bits of code from trainings I did before, and a few of the musics were unarchived one I finished for the moment!

Enjoy and good game!
